channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Xerces C++

item.title: CVE-2017-12627|2024-09-17T01:15:50.981Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20xerces%20c%2B%2B
item.description: In Apache Xerces-C XML Parser library before 3.2.1, processing of external DTD paths can result in a null pointer dereference under certain conditions.
